intro: Nuxia sambesina, commonly known as the African sandmat, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its upright, branched stems and lance-shaped leaves. Nuxia sambesina is also valued for its medicinal properties in traditional African medicine.
